title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 September 2015 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius> has quit

09:51 <tmortagne> has quit  
09:53 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <vmassol> Enygma`, evalica: welcome back! Hope you had a nice time at the conference :)  
10:37 <vmassol> (and good relaxing time in general)  
10:39 <Enygma`> Hi vmassol, yes, thanks :)  
10:40 <Enygma`> finishing with catching up  
10:40 <vmassol> creating wiki for Pbas1...  
10:42 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
11:31 <Pbas1> Ok thxs. FYI extension manager try to install 7.2 version on myxwiki.org 7.1.2 and failed. Of course with description version it's work  
11:32 <vmassol> Pbas1: yes it's a known issue, you need to select the rigth version yourself  
11:32 <Pbas1> Yep done, I just wonder if I must tell you bugs found  
11:33 <vmassol> we need to fix this in not too long, it's  a usaiblity pain  
11:33 <vmassol> hmm  
11:33 <Pbas1> np :-)  
11:33 <vmassol> I don't see an open issue  
11:33 <vmassol> could it be a regression?  
11:33 <vmassol> tmortagne: any idea?  
11:34 <Pbas1> Oups sorry i give you more work -/  
11:34 <tmortagne> no idea  
11:34 <vmassol> :)  
11:35 <vmassol> Pbas1: do you think you could report it in jira?  
11:35 <vmassol> (this time I'm the one giving you more work :))  
11:35 <Pbas1> Sure  
11:35 <vmassol> thanks  
11:40 <Pbas1> np: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12632  
11:44 <vmassol> has quit  
11:44 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki

22:34 <vmassol> thanks evalica for this review of the conf :)  
22:34 <evalica> :) np vmassol - thanks for sending me there  
22:34 <vmassol> glad you liked it!  
22:35 <evalica> we need to keep up with the new technologies

22:36 <evalica> yup
